/* PopupMapper.selectPopup */
select count(1) over() as total_count , row_number() over(order by popup_id desc ) as rnum , tb.* from ( select pop.popup_id , pop.popup_title , pop.popup_link , pop.popup_close1 , pop.popup_close2 , pop.popup_height , pop.popup_width , pop.popup_startdate , pop.popup_enddate , pop.created_id , DATE_FORMAT(pop.created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime , pop.updated_id , DATE_FORMAT(pop.updated_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as updated_datetime , fil.thumb_nm , fil.thumb_origin_nm , fil.thumb_size from tb_popup pop left join ( select file_id , file_nm as thumb_nm , file_origin_nm as thumb_origin_nm , file_size as thumb_size from tb_file ) fil on pop.popup_id = fil.file_id where pop.popup_id like concat(#{id},'%') )tb where 1 = 1

/* PopupMapper.selectPopupInfo */ select pop.popup_id , pop.popup_title , pop.popup_link , pop.popup_close1 , pop.popup_close2 , pop.popup_height , pop.popup_width , pop.popup_startdate , pop.popup_enddate , fil.thumb_nm , fil.thumb_origin_nm , fil.thumb_size from tb_popup pop left join ( select file_id , file_nm as thumb_nm , file_origin_nm as thumb_origin_nm , file_size as thumb_size from tb_file ) fil on pop.popup_id = fil.file_id where pop.popup_id = #{id}
